on reading compounds: 供餅【クモチ】mochi rice cakes used as offering
kun reading compounds: 餅網【もちあみ】grill or grate for toasting rice cakes
五平餅【ごへいもち】skewered sweet rice cakes served with soy sauce and miso
高麗餠【こうらいもち】Kagoshima mochi made from a mixture of rice flour and sweet bean paste, koraimochi
三日の餅【みかのもちい】Heian-period ceremony where a newlywed groom and bride eat a rice-cake on the third night after the wedding ceremony
